name: Popper Paradox
description:
The game is a beat up  inspired in a music Cabeça Dinossauro (Dinosaur Head) of  Brasilian Band (Titans) the game  is about intolerance and violance and  brings to reflect about the Karl Popper Paradox 

Heitor: Programmer

Marcos Teles: Progammer and Art

Natalia Rodrigues: Art
